mapper.insert: insert into t_picture(picture_name, picture_link, picture_desc, picture_reserve, product_id, default_picture) VALUES(#{picture.pictureName},#{picture.pictureLink},#{picture.pictureDesc},#{picture.pictureReserve},#{productId}, #{picture.defaultPicture})
mapper.select: select picture_id, picture_name, picture_link, picture_add_time, picture_desc, picture_reserve,default_picture from t_picture where t_picture.picture_id=#{id}
